vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.14;
son of: David (H1732) and Bathsheba (H1339);
brother of: Shammua (H8051H), Shobab (H7727) and Solomon (H8010);
half-brother of: Amnon (H0550), Chileab (H3609), Absalom (H0053), Adonijah (H0138), Shephatiah (H8203), Ithream (H3507), Ibhar (H2984), Elishua (H0474), Nepheg (H5298H), Japhia (H3309I), Elishama (H0476H), Eliada (H0450), Eliphelet (H0467), Tamar (H8559H), Elpelet (H0467I), Nogah (H5052) and Jerimoth (H3406N);
father of: Mattatha (G3160)
Also named: Nathan<\i> (Ναθάν "Nathan" G3481)
§ Nathan = "giver"
1) a son of David by Bathsheba
2) the eminent prophet in the time of David and Solomon
3) a man of Zobah, father of one of David's mighty warriors
4) father of Azariah who was over the officers of Solomon
5) son of Attai and father of Zabad of the tribe of Judah
6) brother of Joel of the tribe of Judah
7) one of the head men who returned from Babylon with Ezra
8) a man with a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
9) head of a family of Israel who shall mourn when they look on Him whom they pierced
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de David; tribu de Judá; (b)   profeta; en tiempo de los reyes David y Salomón; (c)   padre de un guerrero, en tiempos del rey David; (d)   padre de Azarías, funcionario, en tiempos del rey David; (e)   padre de Azarías, funcionario, en tiempos del rey David; (f)   descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá; (g)   hermano de Joel, guerrero, en tiempos de David; (h)   varios hombres; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿單 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "賜予者"
1) 拔示巴所生大衛的一個兒子 (撒下 5:14)
2) 在大衛與所羅門時期著名的一位先知 (代上 17)
3) 瑣巴人, 大衛戰士之一的父親 (撒下 23:36)
4) 亞撒利雅之父, 而亞撒利雅是所羅門的臣子之一 (王上 4:5)
5) 亞太之子,撒拔之父, 屬猶大族 (代上 2:36)
6) 猶大族約珥的兄弟 (代上 11:38)
7) 和以斯拉從巴以倫歸回的眾領袖之一 (拉 8:16)
8) 和以斯拉同期,娶外邦女子的人 (拉 10:39)
9) 以色列族長之一, 將仰望他們所扎的人並為祂悲哀 (亞 12:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拿单 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "赐予者"
1) 拔示巴所生大卫的一个儿子 (撒下 5:14)
2) 在大卫与所罗门时期著名的一位先知 (代上 17)
3) 琐巴人, 大卫战士之一的父亲 (撒下 23:36)
4) 亚撒利雅之父, 而亚撒利雅是所罗门的臣子之一 (王上 4:5)
5) 亚太之子,撒拔之父, 属犹大族 (代上 2:36)
6) 犹大族约珥的兄弟 (代上 11:38)
7) 和以斯拉从巴以伦归回的众领袖之一 (拉 8:16)
8) 和以斯拉同期,娶外邦女子的人 (拉 10:39)
9) 以色列族长之一, 将仰望他们所扎的人并为祂悲哀 (亚 12:12)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.7.2;
father of: Azariah (H5838H), Zabud (H2071)
§ Nathan = "giver"
1) a son of David by Bathsheba
2) the eminent prophet in the time of David and Solomon
3) a man of Zobah, father of one of David's mighty warriors
4) father of Azariah who was over the officers of Solomon
5) son of Attai and father of Zabad of the tribe of Judah
6) brother of Joel of the tribe of Judah
7) one of the head men who returned from Babylon with Ezra
8) a man with a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
9) head of a family of Israel who shall mourn when they look on Him whom they pierced
